sqlMap.select: select AGENTTYPE_ as agentType, ASSIGNFROM_ as assignFrom, ASSIGNTO_ as assignTo, OBJECTID_ as objectId, OBJECTVALUE_ as objectValue, PROCESSNAME_ as processName, TASKNAME_ as taskName, STARTDATE_ as startDate, ENDDATE_ as endDate from sys_agent where ASSIGNTO_ = #assignTo#
SELECT u.account as actorId, u.name as name, u.deptId as deptId, u.email as mail, u.mobile as mobile FROM sys_user u where u.blocked = 0

SELECT u.account as actorId, u.name as name, u.deptId as deptId, u.email as mail, u.mobile as mobile FROM sys_user u WHERE u.blocked = 0 AND u.id IN ( SELECT r.userId FROM sys_user_role r WHERE r.authorized = 0 AND r.roleId IN ( SELECT a.id FROM sys_dept_role a, sys_role b WHERE 1=1 AND a.sysRoleId = b.id
( a.deptId = #deptId# )
( b.code = #roleId# )
( a.deptId = #deptIds[]# )
( b.code = #roleIds[]# )
) )

SELECT u.account as actorId, u.name as name, u.deptId as deptId, u.email as mail, u.mobile as mobile FROM sys_user u WHERE u.blocked = 0 AND u.id IN ( SELECT r.userId FROM sys_user_role r WHERE r.authorized = 0 AND r.roleId IN ( SELECT a.id FROM sys_dept_role a, sys_role b WHERE 1=1 AND a.sysRoleId = b.id
( a.deptId = #deptId# )
( b.code = #roleId# )
( a.deptId = #deptIds[]# )
( b.code = #roleIds[]# )
) )
